---
title: "recursive_replace_mapping"
description: "Recursively replace strings using a mapping dictionary"
---





## Parameters

<ParamField path="data" type="UnionType[list[recursive_data], Dict[str, recursive_data], str, Any]" required>
  The input data to process (dict, list, str, or any other type)
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="replacement_map" type="Dict[str, str]" required>
  A dictionary mapping strings to their replacements
</ParamField>

## Returns

`recursive_data`:     The modified data structure with replacements
